page.title: 02Warslow/Hulme End Home-helps
page.content:
Because there is quite a large proportion of older people in the area, there is a need for home-helps. There is one lady in Warslow and one in Hulme End who do this job.
The lady in Warslow looks after 7 people in the village and visits them at least once a day. Her duties include helping the people to get up in the mornings, if they are unable to do it by themselves. She also helps them to tidy up and vacuum their homes, as well as laying the fire and lighting it. She gives them their tablets if they need them and does their shopping.
She started being a home-help at the suggestion of a friend and enjoys her work because she is helping people and doing a varied job for which she is appreciated.
